name: Shank
description: Take pest control into your own hands. Deals 5 damage.

name: Multi-Shiv
description: Usually you get your indentured workers to do this. Deals 2 damage, 5 times.

name: Oil Spill
description: Spray some of your hard-earned oil as a distraction. Dazes the enemy, cancelling their next action.

name: Punch
description: Your own hands. Literally. Deals 2 damage.

name: Precise Shot
description: Hit a weak point, inflicting Vulnerable for 1 turn. This makes each individual hit deal 2 more damage.
